name: Baldi's Basics Android:Scary Escape Horror School
name_original: Baldi's Basics Android:Scary Escape Horror School
description:
Welcome To Scary school escape : The Horror game
This is a Horror game where you have to collect All notebooks and try to escape from
The Scary teacher and other scary and terrifying neighbor monsters .
This scary game is different from other Horror Games & Scary games and here is why:
- The scary teacher seems to be a mix between a zombie and a Math teacher
- Every Notebook has Math questions , Test your Basic Math education and learning skills and find the exit ASAP !
- In addition to scary teacher, there is also some neighbor.
Will you escape the school? Download Scary school escape : The Horror game for free!
Enjoy Playing !
Read Privacy Policy Link below For collecting data policy.
